TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UrlEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供选择 URL 的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，提供的对话框中选择一个 URL。 is a that provides a dialog box for selecting a URL. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual string Filter { get; }
.property instance string Filter
Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取编辑器的文件名筛选器字符串。

span.span: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.

summary.span: 这用来确定在对话框的文件列表中显示的项。

span.span: This is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含对话框中可用的文件筛选选项的信息。

span.span: A string that contains information about the file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定筛选器字符串的所有文件 (*。\*)。The property specifies a filter string for all files (*.\*). 筛选器字符串包含一个或多个筛选器选项。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每个筛选器选项包含说明的筛选器，跟垂直条 (|) 和筛选器模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 由竖线分隔的字符串不同筛选选项。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是一个包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串的示例：The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Text Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Text Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 通过用分号分隔的筛选器模式，可以在筛选器选项中指定多个筛选器模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 下面是在其中第一个筛选器选项指定三种筛选器模式的筛选器字符串示例：The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies three filter patterns: "`Text Files(*.txt;*.text;*.lst)|*.txt;*.text;*.lst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Text Files(*.txt;*.text;*.lst)|*.txt;*.text;*.lst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
